sentences.en: a medicine bottle
sentences.cn: 药瓶

sentences.en: Have you been taking your medicine ?
sentences.cn: 你一直在服药吗？

sentences.en: He was examined again and then prescribed a different herbal medicine.
sentences.cn: 医生又对他诊察了一遍，然后开了另外一种草药。

sentences.en: I left medicine anyway. I wasn't really cut out for it.
sentences.cn: 我还是放弃学医了，我真的不是那块料。

sentences.en: I repeat that medicine is on the brink of a revolution.
sentences.cn: 我要再次强调，医学面临着变革。

sentences.en: I was interested in alternative medicine and becoming an aromatherapist.
sentences.cn: 我对替代疗法非常感兴趣，想做个芳香疗法治疗师。

sentences.en: I'm statistic-phobic, and hopelessly ignorant of medicine.
sentences.cn: 我对统计数据感到恐惧，对药物一窍不通。

sentences.en: In Belgium only qualified doctors may practise alternative medicine.
sentences.cn: 在比利时只有资质合格的医生才能从事非传统医学工作。

sentences.en: It was published in the "Annals of Internal Medicine".
sentences.cn: 它发表在《内科医学年鉴》上。

sentences.en: Medicines should be kept out of the reach of children.
sentences.cn: 药应放在孩子够不到的地方。

sentences.en: Most doctors appear to recognize homeopathy as a legitimate form of medicine.
sentences.cn: 大多数医生似乎都接受顺势疗法是一种合理的医疗手段。

sentences.en: Oncology is the branch of medicine dealing with tumors.
sentences.cn: 肿瘤学是研究肿瘤的医学分支。

sentences.en: Planes landed at Bagram airport today carrying badly needed food and medicine.
sentences.cn: 运载急需食物和药品的飞机今天在巴格拉姆机场降落。

sentences.en: Psychiatry is an accepted branch of medicine.
sentences.cn: 精神病学是公认的医学分支。

sentences.en: Scientific development meant the growth of numerous professions ancillary to medicine.
sentences.cn: 科技发展意味着许多医学衍生职业的增长。

sentences.en: She studied medicine at Johns Hopkins University.
sentences.cn: 她曾在约翰•霍普金斯大学学医。

sentences.en: The medicine chemically affects your physiology.
sentences.cn: 这种药会通过化学作用影响生理机能。

sentences.en: the remarkable achievements of modern medicine
sentences.cn: 现代医学的非凡成就

sentences.en: tired of his humiliation of me, I decided to give him a taste of his own medicine.
sentences.cn: 我厌倦了他对我的羞辱，于是我决定以牙还牙。

sentences.en: To some people, herbal medicine is quackery.
sentences.cn: 在有些人看来，用草药治病纯属江湖医术。

sentences.en: Traditionally young Asians in Britain have gravitated towards medicine, law and engineering.
sentences.cn: 英国的亚裔年轻人通常被吸引到医学、法律及工程专业。

words.tran_cn: 有药效的；可治病的；有治疗作用的
药的；药用的；治疗的（等于medicinable）；有益的
药物；药物治疗；药物处理

phrases.phrase: give someone a dose (或taste) of their own medicine
phrases.tran_cn: 以牙还牙；以其治人之道还治其人之身
接受惩罚（或令人讨厌的事物）

trans.tran_en: a substance used for treating illness, especially a liquid you drink
